description: Create a new Source Network resource for a provided VPC ID.

parameters.name: originAccountID
parameters.description: Account containing the VPC to protect.

parameters.name: originRegion
parameters.description: Region containing the VPC to protect.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A set of tags to be associated with the Source Network resource. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: sourceNetworkID
nested_items.description: ID of the created Source Network.
